author: Bollywood Hungama
title: Check out: Bollywood celebs who got ‘inked’ today - Bollywood Hungama
text:
Home » News » Features » Check out: Bollywood celebs who got ‘inked’ today Check out: Bollywood celebs who got ‘inked’ today Bollywood Hungama News Network Feb 21, 2017 - 12:14 pm IST 0 0 
After days and weeks of political campaigning, the D-day (or should we call it as the V-Day) has finally arrived today. Like any common man, even the Bollywood celebs stood in line in order to cast their votes. Bollywood Hungama brings you a first-hand detail of Bollywood celebs casting their vote. 
The never-say-tired Ranveer Singh was one of the first people to have cast his vote. He had turned up with his father Jagjit Singh Bhavnani. V O T E ???? pic.twitter.com/TRfhsN8zNq 
— Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) February 21, 2017 
Started my morning by casting my https://t.co/Z817hxXwb7 is our duty towards our country & its progress.Pls go out&vote #VoteKarMaharashtra pic.twitter.com/fgXGxjkEcV 
The hunky John Abraham , who happens to be residing in Bandra, went onto cast his vote and also urged others to vote as well. Cast your vote..I cast mine!! #BMCElections2017 pic.twitter.com/ZDOXOgR8Ce 
— John Abraham (@TheJohnAbraham) February 21, 2017 
Zoya Akhtar, who has been away from the spotlight for some time now, was seen showing her ‘inked’ finger when she came out of the polling booth after casting her vote. 
The eternal Diva Rekha, who was looking stunning (as always) in her trademarked saree, was also seen showing her inked finger to the media after casting her vote to her favourite candidate. 
Point a finger at them only when you get this point on your finger! #Vote to earn the right to question! #VoteKarMaharashtra pic.twitter.com/OH3yvRkxSA
